title: Storyline-Based Consistency Support Process for Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic science knowledge and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/job seekers. Domain Expertise: Intermediate. Subject/Job Field: Science. Delivery Method: Synchronous online (Zoom, etc.). Assessment Method: Summative assessment-focused. Technology Environment: BYOD. Duration: Short-term intensive course (within 1 week).

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more explanatory models for scientific phenomena based on a storyline.
Learners perform five or more iterative design-test-revision cycles to solve scientific problems set by the classroom community.
Learners independently generate and discuss ten or more meaningful questions from phenomena presented in the storyline educational model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
